thread.title: Someone from the Netherlands
thread.title_full: Bundle Stars reviewed by Someone from the Netherlands

author: Someone from the Netherlands
title: Someone from the Netherlands
text: In my experience, buying games from Bundle Stars is really easy. If there is some bundle you are interested in, delivery occurs instantly. Sometimes they need to verify you personally, but even then it usually happens fast! Uncomplicated, good website :)
